introduction: 陈萝因为替父亲还赌债，被迫嫁给经营小巴生意的丁，尽管她与工厂工人英相爱。他们有5个孩子，最大的是洪，第二个是科军，第三个是马，最小的是一对双胞胎男孩和女孩，Muay和Montri。与此同时，郢有机会进入一个将军谁是刀的父亲。他开始学习，并通过书信与陈保持联系，给她带来安慰。毕业后，他在道父亲的帮助下当上了副区长。他也终于和她结婚了。他们的婚姻只有一个女儿，宁。Tee最终开始了外遇，让他的妻子和孩子陷入贫困。但在此之前，当他发现她与英的关系时，他袭击了她。绝望中，除了Montri，Chan决定带她的孩子离开Tee的家。另一方面，道在发现丈夫与前女友陈保持联系后，也大发雷霆。单身母亲的生活从来都不美好。为了让她的孩子吃饱，陈努力工作。这甚至导致她搬进了百万富翁孔的房子作为一个女仆和情妇。然而，这并没有持续很长时间，因为不久孔试图强奸她的大女儿洪，当他们没有这样做时，将他们赶出了他的家。有一天，成龙帮助了一个善良的百万富翁Jit，他从一个小偷那里拥有一个果园。为了感谢她，Jit帮助Chan。最终，陈萝摆脱了悲惨的生活，并拥有了一家水果罐头厂。尽管如此，幸福的生活还是遥遥无期。Chan was forced into marriage to Tee who owns a minibus business for paying her father's gambling debt although being in love with Ying, a factory worker. They had 5 children, the eldest is Hong, the second is Kla, the third is Ma, and the youngest is a twin boy and girl, Muay and Montri.Meanwhile, Ying had a chance to move in with a general who is the father of Dao. He started to study, and still maintained contact with Chan through letters which provide her comfort. After graduation, he became a Deputy district chief with the help of Dao's father. He also finally got married to her. They have an only daughter from their marriage, Ning.Tee eventually began to have an affair, leaving his wife and children in poverty. But not before assaulting her when he found out about her connection with Ying.  In despair, Chan decided to bring her children except for Montri out of Tee's house. On the other hand, Dao was also furious upon discovering that her husband kept in contact with his ex-girlfriend Chan.Life for a single mother is hardly ever beautiful.  In order to keep her children fed, Chan worked hard. It even led her to move into Millionaire Kong's house as a maid and mistress. However, that did not last long because soon Kong attempted to rape her eldest daughter, Hong, and when failing to do so chased them out of his home.One day, Chan helped a kind millionaire, Jit, who owns an orchard from a thief. To thank her, Jit helps Chan out. Eventually, Chan leaves the life of misery and is able to own a canned fruit factory.Nonetheless, happily ever after is nowhere near.
